text: Elverson Road is a light metro station on the Docklands Light Railway (DLR) Bank-Lewisham Line. It is in the residential district of St John's in south- east London. It opened in 1999 as part of the Lewisham extension of the DLR. The station is between Deptford Bridge and Lewisham stations. It is on the boundary of Travelcard Zone 2 and Zone 3. Category:Docklands Light Railway stations Category:Transport in the London Borough of Lewisham
title: Elverson Road DLR station
